projects.name: ARI
projects.description: Azure Resource Inventory .NET Tool - Inventories and documents Azure Tenant resources to a set of markdown files for specified tenant to a specified folder.

projects.name: Blobify
projects.description: Blobify is a .NET Global tool that archives (moves) files from a local folder to Azure Blob Storage container.

projects.name: BRI
projects.description: Bicep Registry Inventory .NET Tool - Inventories and documents Bicep modules in a Azure container registry.

projects.name: Cake
projects.description: Cake (C# Make) is a build automation system with a C# DSL to do things like compiling code, copy files/folders, running unit tests, compress files and build NuGet packages.

projects.name: Cake.Bridge.DependencyInjection
projects.description: Provides helpers for providing Cake context using Microsoft DependencyInjection, letting you use Cake Core/Common/Addins abstractions and aliases.

projects.name: Devlead.Statiq
projects.description: Provides helpers and extensions for the static site generator Statiq, i.e. themes from http uri and TabGroup shortcode.

projects.name: DPI
projects.description: Dependency Inventory .NET Tool - Inventories dependencies and reports to Azure Log Analytics

projects.name: LitJson
projects.description: A .Net library to handle conversions from and to JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) strings.

projects.name: Spectre.Console.Cli.Extensions.DependencyInjection
projects.description: A type provider for the CLI component of Spectre.Console using the Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection container.

projects.name: Unpack DAC Package .NET Tool
projects.description: Extracts dacpac and generates deployment script to target folder without need for actual database running.
